ng-model was undefined

7 Nov 2014

ng-model not work

ng-model-undefined-in-the-controller

example: inoic in plnkr

solution: ```js $scope.model = {}; $scope.model.code = "test";

$scope.setCode = function(){ alert($scope.model.code); } ```
